name: Seunghee Shin
content: HomeSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationSeunghee ShinEmail: sshin AT binghamton.eduAssistant ProfessorDepartment of Computer Science, SUNY BinghamtonI am currently hiring a Ph.D. student. Please contact me if you have an interest in my research.BiographySeunghee Shin received his Ph.D. degree from Electrical and Computer Engineering department at North Carolina State University, Raleigh, NC.  He also has M.S. degree in Computer Science from Northeastern University, MA, where he studied computer networks. His primary research interests lie in computer architecture and systems. Specifically, he has high interests in investigating the impact of emerging technologies on memory systems. Besides, he has more than five years of professional system software development experiences in multiple companies where he engaged in mobile and storage system development projects. PublicationsQi
